trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
text: <$title_short_name$> has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The Weevil makes three melee attacks with his handaxes. Or the Weevil makes two ranged attacks with his handaxes.

action.name: Handaxe +1
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
text: The captain adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the captain must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
